sentences.en: a shady nook in the garden
After flowering, place the pot in a shady spot in the garden.
sentences.cn: 花期过后，将花盆放到花园里的背阴处。

sentences.en: Clara had been reading in a lounge chair under a shady tree.
sentences.cn: 克拉拉一直坐在树阴下的躺椅上看书。

sentences.en: Ferns grow in shady and moist places.
sentences.cn: 羊齿类植物生长在阴暗潮湿的地方.

sentences.en: He has engaged in rather shady occupation.
sentences.cn: 他从事相当不明不白的职业.
他是个相当靠不住的人.

sentences.en: It was nice and shady under the trees.
Joseph watched a shady-looking bunch playing cards aboard a Mississippi steamer.
sentences.cn: 约瑟夫看到一群可疑的人在密西西比河的一艘轮船上打牌。

sentences.en: She was a shady figure in the Dublin underworld.
sentences.cn: 她是都柏林犯罪圈子中的可疑人物.

sentences.en: She’s been involved in some shady deals.
sentences.cn: 她参与了一些不正当的事情。

sentences.en: Thatched pavilions provide shady retreats for relaxing and reading in privacy.
sentences.cn: 茅草亭是独自放松和读书的阴凉清幽之所。

sentences.en: The company was notorious for shady deals.
sentences.cn: 该公司因其不法交易而臭名昭著。

sentences.en: The rooms are admirably cool and shady after the hot brown monotony of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 在乡间经受过持续的暴晒后，房间里显得特别阴凉宜人。

sentences.en: The tourists sought out a shady spot where they sat down and rested.
sentences.cn: 游客找到一块阴凉的地方坐下休息.

sentences.en: They sought out a shady spot where they might sit down and rest.
sentences.cn: 他们找到一块阴凉地方可以坐下休息.

sentences.en: Use spot meter to isolate bridge roof, then shady side of bridge.
sentences.cn: 用特写仪把桥顶单独划出, 然后是桥的背阴影面.

words.tran_cn: 树荫；阴影；阴凉处；遮阳物；（照片等的）明暗度；少量、些微；细微的差别
暧昧；隐蔽；有阴影的情形
底纹；遮蔽；[印刷] 明暗法；[印刷] 描影法；留下阴影
阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处
遮蔽住；使阴暗（shade的过去分词）
使阴暗；使渐变；为…遮阳；使阴郁；掩盖
成荫的；阴暗的；名声不好的

trans.tran_cn: 背阴的，隐蔽的，名声不好的，可疑的
trans.tran_en: protected from the sun or producing shade
